name: Mira (demo)
description:
Hi there!
Mira is a adventure game we are working for a while now. We are looking for some feedback right now so... we are hoping to hear some from ya!. Feel free to write here, on mail or in our in game questionare! :)

And have fun in our short "demo"!

"Mira" is an adventure game inspired by Slavonic myths. It emphasises primarily the exploration of the presented world and the story of the title heroine, a nanny in an orphanage existing after World War II. The player, by moving along hand-painted boards and, owing to his interaction with that world, will become acquainted with new parts of the story. But not only: by his own decisions he will impact its end.

An oak forest, mossy paths, you're walking barefoot on the carpet of grass and moss. Sometimes you can hear a crack, a whisper, water dripping or the wind blowing. Little wildfires twinkle above the water. It is empty and quiet but you feel a tension. Meeting someone who has long known about your arrival is near. In the distance, above the trees, you can see familiar-looking castle towers. But there are more of them; some are different - you remember drawings from a museum. This world is different. You can feel it in the air, in the light, in earth vibrations. This is the primeval Navia's energy.
